Reviews.Title: Nice features!
Reviews.Author: INDALU
Reviews.Content: This is Canon's new and improved Power Shot model.  I bought it to replace an older lower megapixel version.  The picture quality is excellent.  And the zoom is unbelievably great. Picture quality at max zoom is very good.  It has a billion features. I will probably never use some (including the WiFi) but it's great technology. Love being able to Edit on the camera and add effects. Good in low light. Macros are great. My only slight negative is the physical size.  It is smaller than I expected.  I have short stubby fingers and it is a little hard for me to grip, but otherwise I'm really happy with the purchase.  Snap this up....was $249 a few weeks ago and now already up to $269.  The bundle which includes a 32 memory card and extra battery is well worth the money.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor
Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
1080p Full HD video
30x Optical Zoom and 24mm Wide-Angle lens
Optical Image Stabilizer
